statements: UPDATE genetic_data SET treatment_options = '{"option": "A", "dosage": 100}' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE genetic_data SET genetic_code = 'AGTC' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE genetic_data SET genetic_code = 'AAGCTTACG', treatment_options = '{"option1": "active", "option2": "inactive"}' WHERE patient_id = 100
UPDATE genetic_data SET treatment_options = '{"option1": "inactive", "option2": "active"}', genetic_code = 'CGTAACTGA' WHERE patient_id = 200

UPDATE PatientGeneticData SET genetic_variant = '{"variant": "A", "location": "chromosome 1"}', treatment_options = '{"options": ["therapy A", "therapy B"]}' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE GeneticTestResults SET test_results = '{"result": "positive", "mutation": "mutation X"}' WHERE patient_id = '567e89b0-e12d-3456-a678-891011121314';

UPDATE PatientGeneticData SET genetic_variant = '{"gene":"BRCA1", "mutation":"C772G"}', treatment_options = '{"surgery":"mastectomy", "chemotherapy":"cisplatin"}' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE TreatmentHistory SET treatment_description = 'Lung cancer targeted therapy' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND treatment_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35 WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE Treatments SET description = 'New Description' WHERE treatment_id = 5;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Treatments SET description = 'New and improved treatment for chronic pain', effectiveness = 'High' WHERE treatment_id = 201;
UPDATE patient_data SET patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE treatment_options SET option_description = 'New treatment option available' WHERE option_id = 3;
UPDATE patient_data SET genetic_code = 'AAACGTGTC' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE treatment_options SET option_description = 'New treatment option with updated information' WHERE option_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, diagnosis = 'Hypertension' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE GeneticData SET genetic_sequence = 'ACGTGCTAGCTAGTACGTGCTAGCTAGTCAGT', mutation_type = 'Deletion' WHERE data_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, diagnosis = 'Hypertension' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Treatments SET treatment_description = 'New treatment has been prescribed.' WHERE patient_id = 105;
